alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Mainland Dare; Mainland Hyde (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued January 09 at 2:52PM EST until January 10 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...2 to 4 feet of inundation above ground level possible in low-lying areas near tidal waterways. * WHERE...Areas along Pamlico Sound, Pamlico and Pungo Rivers and adjacent tidal creeks. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...2 to 4 feet of inundation above ground level is possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways resulting in a threat of property damage. Numerous roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure may be inundated.
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
